description:
From unraveling the secrets of opening and closing doors to defusing surprise packages more commonly known as bombs, there is never a dull day at the Hololive Production office! Holo no Graffiti follows an eccentric cast of Virtual YouTubers, also known as "VTubers," going about their absurd yet hilarious daily lives, detailing all their cute moments and mishaps.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)

tags.name: VTuber
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is either an actual or fictive VTuber.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Succubus
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a succubus, a creature in medieval folklore that typically uses their sexual prowess to trap and seduce people to feed off them.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Shrine Maiden
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a shrine maiden.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Pirates
tags.description: Prominently features sea-faring adventurers branded as criminals by the law.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.description: Prominently features a female office worker or OL.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.name: Judo
tags.description: Centers around the sport of judo.

tags.description: Centers around the sport of fishing.

tags.name: Kaiju
tags.description: Prominently features giant monsters.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Real Robot
tags.description: Prominently features mechanical designs loosely influenced by real-world robotics.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Necromancy
tags.description: When the dead are summoned as spirits, skeletons, or the undead, usually for the purpose of gaining information or to be used as a weapon.

tags.name: Space
tags.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

tags.name: Body Swapping
tags.description: Centers around individuals swapping bodies with one another.

tags.name: Cars
tags.description: Centers around the use of automotive vehicles.

tags.name: Aliens
tags.description: Prominently features extraterrestrial lifeforms.

name.native: アキ・ローゼンタール
アキ・ローゼンタール

node.description:
Éric Alfred Leslie Satie, who signed his name Erik Satie after 1884, was a French composer and pianist.

Satie was introduced as a "gymnopedist" in 1887, shortly before writing his most famous compositions, the Gymnopédies. Later, he also referred to himself as a "phonometrician" (meaning "someone who measures sounds") preferring this designation to that of "musician", after having been called "a clumsy but subtle technician" in a book on contemporary French composers published in 1911.
